QuestData.Title: Tiger Stalking
QuestData.Description: Young tigers are one thing. Fully-grown cats are another. Hunting the grown Stranglethorn tigers will prove an even greater challenge.$b$bThe adult cats normally spend their days south of Kurzen's Compound, east of the river.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you strive for greater challenges you must first prove yourself with the task at hand. Return to me after you've killed 10 Stranglethorn Tigers.
QuestData.RewardText: Tiger blood coats your hands, your weapons, and your $c garb. Yet still you crave more.
